channel.title: Abouts on ewenme
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on ewenme

item.title: About
item.description: Ewen (pronounced you-n). R fanboy and advocate for open source / open science. Telling empathetic stories about my diverse excursions in data science. Otherwise, find me listening to weird ‘n’ dusty records and sinking into a Discogs wormhole.
